Class FloatValueConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.ValueConverter
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.FloatValueConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String>

    public class FloatValueConverter
extends ValueConverter
    Handles conversion of float values in decimal and scientific notation.
